description:
*Full game now free!* 
Grab your headphones! In this quirky rhythm game, you take on the role of Cecil the Squirrel as he tries to dodge the relentless attacks of a ferocious dog named "The Enforcer" to the beat of some squirrelly music.

Dodge the Enforcer's attacks, pile up some acorns, and dance to your own beat!

The game contains 8-bit inspired graphics, lots of acorns (achievements) to earn, all original music, and your ears don't deceive you, the time signature is in 9/8.

Jump to the beat to earn points by hopping over the Enforcer.
And if that wasn’t enough to blow your socks off, it has four different levels, with all original songs. Jump well and win!

Grab Squirrel Step Plus for more levels and mp3s of the songs.
